channel.title: Making admins/mods
channel.description: I'm starting fresh for a private server by using the moparscape bundled hybridscape server. I've been looking everywhere but i can't figure out the code to make my char. an admin. does anyone have the code or w/e?

item.title: Making admins/mods
item.dc:creator: @moerin moerin
item.description:
@moerin wrote:

probullet:

sorry i meant to say make the gold crown

Search for Character, and click on ur name.
U will see Player-Rights: 0
Changes them to
1= Moderator (Silver Crown)
2= Administrator(GoldCrown)
3= Co-owner or Owner (Goldcrown too but then more options to do)
4= Invisable Owner AdMinistrator (No crown but the same as player rights 3
Save it and ur Mod/Admin/Co-owner/Owner/Invisable Owner.
U need to logg out.
Edit: U have to logg out before its working.
Save it if u changed something.

Edit:
[ACCOUNT]
character-username = Ur username
character-password = Ur password

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 2659
character-posy = 3317
character-rights = 2 <— This u need Changes to 1 or 2 or 3 or 4, look up what it is.
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = Ur ip Adress
character-lastlogin = 20080026
character-energy = 100
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 0

Thanks, i hope i helped u, Moerin

Read full topic

item.title: Making admins/mods
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Mopar69 Mod Mopar69
item.description:
@Mod_Mopar69 wrote:

ok go to your files and press ‘characters’ then press on your notepad and a notepad comes up dont touch anything only on player rights take the 0 off and make it 3 for owner
1=mod 2=admin 3=owner
Thanks for reading

Read full topic
